00021 class TestResult {
00022 public:
00023         SpotterParams params;   
00024         std::string name;               
00025         long cpuTime;                   
00026         dist_calls_t distCalls; 
00027         double meanLatency;             
00028         double stdLatency;              
00029         double pruningPower;    
00030         
00031         // override addition and multiplication so we can easily take averages
00032         TestResult & operator+=(const TestResult &rhs);
00033 //      TestResult operator+(const TestResult &other) const;
00034         TestResult & operator*=(double d);
00035 //      TestResult operator*(double d) const;
00036         
00037 //      TestResult();
00038         
00039         void setPrecision(double p) {
00040                 precision = p;
00041                 updateF1score();
00042         }
00043         void setRecall(double r) {
00044                 recall = r;
00045                 updateF1score();
00046         }
00047         double getPrecision() const {
00048                 return precision;
00049         }
00050         double getRecall() const {
00051                 return recall;
00052         }
00053         double getF1score() const {
00054                 return f1score;
00055         }
00056 private:
00057         double precision;               
00058         double recall;                  
00059         double f1score;                 
00060         
00061         void updateF1score() {
00062                 f1score = calcF1score(precision, recall);
00063         }
00064 };
00065 
00066 inline double calcF1score(double precision, double recall) {
00067         if (precision > 0 && recall > 0) {
00068                 return 2*precision*recall / (precision + recall);
00069         } else {
00070                 return 0;
00071         }
00072 }
